name: Twilio
description: Access Twilio's communication APIs including SMS, Voice, Video, and more through the official Twilio Alpha MCP server covering 1,400+ API endpoints.

inputs.label: Twilio Credentials
inputs.description: Twilio credentials in the format ACCOUNT_SID/API_KEY:API_SECRET. Requires your Account SID, an API Key, and its corresponding API Secret.

obtain.instructions:
1. Go to the Twilio Console
2. Copy your Account SID from the dashboard
3. Navigate to Account > API keys & tokens
4. Click 'Create API key'
5. Copy the SID and Secret
6. Combine as: ACCOUNT_SID/API_KEY_SID:API_SECRET

auth.instructions: Create an API key at https://www.twilio.com/console/project/api-keys and combine with your Account SID as ACCOUNT_SID/API_KEY:API_SECRET
